parameters.name: BusinessStatus
parameters.description:
The payment status of the VPN gateway. Valid values:

*   **Normal**
*   **FinancialLocked**

parameters.name: IncludeReservationData
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return information about pending orders. Valid values:

*   **false** (default)
*   **true**

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: **1** to **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPN gateway.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the VPN gateway belongs.

 You can call the [ListResourceGroups](~~158855~~) operation to query the resource group list.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the VPN gateway. Valid values:

*   **init**
*   **provisioning**
*   **active**
*   **updating**
*   **deleting**

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The value of tag N to add to the resource.

The value of this parameter can be an empty string and cannot exceed 128 characters in length. It cannot start with `aliyun` or `acs:`, and cannot contain `http://` or `https://`.

Each tag key corresponds to one tag value. You can specify at most 20 tag values in each call.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the VPN gateway belongs.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPN gateway.
